title: [BUG] error building UWP
body:
error 1

```
       "K:\AndroidUI-SkiaSharp\source\SkiaSharpSource.Windows-netfx.slnf" (Build target) (1:2) ->
       "K:\AndroidUI-SkiaSharp\source\SkiaSharp.Views\SkiaSharp.Views.UWP\SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.csproj" (default target) (
       11:7) ->
       "K:\AndroidUI-SkiaSharp\binding\SkiaSharp.UWP\SkiaSharp.UWP.csproj" (default target) (6:22) ->
       (CoreCompile target) ->
         K:\AndroidUI-SkiaSharp\binding\Binding.Shared\PlatformConfiguration.cs(37,15): error CS0103: The name 'Package'
        does not exist in the current context [K:\AndroidUI-SkiaSharp\binding\SkiaSharp.UWP\SkiaSharp.UWP.csproj]
```

error 2
```
         K:\AndroidUI-SkiaSharp\binding\Binding.Shared\PlatformConfiguration.cs(38,10): error CS0731: The type forwarder
        for type 'Windows.System.ProcessorArchitecture' in assembly 'Windows' causes a cycle [K:\AndroidUI-SkiaSharp\bin
       ding\SkiaSharp.UWP\SkiaSharp.UWP.csproj]
         K:\AndroidUI-SkiaSharp\binding\Binding.Shared\PlatformConfiguration.cs(38,10): error CS1069: The type name 'Pro
       cessorArchitecture' could not be found in the namespace 'Windows.System'. This type has been forwarded to assembl
       y 'Windows, Version=255.255.255.255, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null, ContentType=WindowsRuntime' Consider a
       dding a reference to that assembly.
```
```
    30 Warning(s)
    17 Error(s)

Time Elapsed 00:00:46.11
An error occurred when executing task 'libs'.
```



for the first i found

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.applicationmodel.packageid.architecture?view=winrt-16299

for `var arch = Package.Current.Id.Architecture`

for the second i found https://stackoverflow.com/questions/51876536/type-forwarded-to-assembly-windows-version-255-255-255-255-when-trying-to-us

which apparently fixes it

im not sure if it is safe to apply these and i am not sure how to apply the latter via command-line
